verses.verse: אֵלֶּה֩ <S%H428><s%> These דִבְרֵ֨י <S%H1697><s%> These [are] the words הַבְּרִ֜ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant אֲ‍ֽשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which צִוָּ֧ה <S%H6680><s%> commanded יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מֹשֶׁ֗ה <S%H4872><s%> Moses לִכְרֹ֛ת <S%H3772><s%> to make אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> with בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> with the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מוֹאָ֑ב <S%H4124><s%> of Moab מִלְּבַ֣ד <S%H905><s%> alone הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> beside the covenant אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> which he made אִתָּ֖ם <S%H854><s%> at בְּחֹרֵֽב׃ <S%H2722><s%> with them in Horeb פ

וַיִּקְרָ֥א <S%H7121><s%> called מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> And Moses אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> unto all Israel וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <S%H559><s%> and said אֲלֵהֶ֑ם <S%H413><s%> about אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> You רְאִיתֶ֗ם <S%H7200><s%> unto them Ye have seen אֵ֣ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> after עָשָׂ֨ה <S%H6213><s%> did יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> all that the LORD לְעֵֽינֵיכֶם֙ <S%H5869><s%> before your eyes בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt לְפַרְעֹ֥ה <S%H6547><s%> unto Pharaoh וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all עֲבָדָ֖יו <S%H5650><s%> and unto all his servants וּלְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> and all אַרְצֽוֹ׃ <S%H776><s%> and unto all his land

הַמַּסּוֹת֙ <S%H4531><s%> temptations הַגְּדֹלֹ֔ת <S%H1419><s%> The great אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which רָא֖וּ <S%H7200><s%> have seen עֵינֶ֑יךָ <S%H5869><s%> which thine eyes הָאֹתֹ֧ת <S%H226><s%> the signs וְהַמֹּפְתִ֛ים <S%H4159><s%> miracles הַגְּדֹלִ֖ים <S%H1419><s%> and those great הָהֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> those

וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> nor נָתַן֩ <S%H5414><s%> hath not given יְהוָ֨ה <S%H3068><s%> Yet the LORD לָכֶ֥ם לֵב֙ <S%H3820><s%> you an heart לָדַ֔עַת <S%H3045><s%> to perceive וְעֵינַ֥יִם <S%H5869><s%> and eyes לִרְא֖וֹת <S%H7200><s%> to see וְאָזְנַ֣יִם <S%H241><s%> and ears לִשְׁמֹ֑עַ <S%H8085><s%> to hear עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> against הַיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וָאוֹלֵ֥ךְ <S%H1980><s%> have led אֶתְכֶ֛ם <S%H853><s%> אַרְבָּעִ֥ים <S%H705><s%> you forty שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> years בַּמִּדְבָּ֑ר <S%H4057><s%> in the wilderness לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not בָל֤וּ <S%H1086><s%> are not waxen old שַׂלְמֹֽתֵיכֶם֙ <S%H8008><s%> your clothes מֵעֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H5921><s%> on וְנַֽעַלְךָ֥ <S%H5275><s%> upon you and thy shoe לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> has not בָלְתָ֖ה <S%H1086><s%> is not waxen old מֵעַ֥ל <S%H5921><s%> on רַגְלֶֽךָ׃ <S%H7272><s%> upon thy foot

לֶ֚חֶם <S%H3899><s%> bread לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor אֲכַלְתֶּ֔ם <S%H398><s%> Ye have not eaten וְיַ֥יִן <S%H3196><s%> wine וְשֵׁכָ֖ר <S%H7941><s%> or strong drink לֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor שְׁתִיתֶ֑ם <S%H8354><s%> neither have ye drunk לְמַ֙עַן֙ <S%H4616><s%> order תֵּֽדְע֔וּ <S%H3045><s%> that ye might know כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> that אֲנִ֥י <S%H589><s%> I am יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> that I [am] the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶֽם׃ <S%H430><s%> your God

וַתָּבֹ֖אוּ <S%H935><s%> And when ye came אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about הַמָּק֣וֹם <S%H4725><s%> unto this place הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וַיֵּצֵ֣א <S%H3318><s%> came out סִיחֹ֣ן <S%H5511><s%> Sihon מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king חֶ֠שְׁבּוֹן <S%H2809><s%> of Heshbon וְע֨וֹג <S%H5747><s%> and Og מֶֽלֶךְ־ <S%H4428><s%> the king הַבָּשָׁ֧ן <S%H1316><s%> of Bashan לִקְרָאתֵ֛נוּ <S%H7125><s%> against לַמִּלְחָמָ֖ה <S%H4421><s%> us unto battle וַנַּכֵּֽם׃ <S%H5221><s%> and we smote

וַנִּקַּח֙ <S%H3947><s%> And we took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אַרְצָ֔ם <S%H776><s%> their land וַנִּתְּנָ֣הּ <S%H5414><s%> and gave לְנַחֲלָ֔ה <S%H5159><s%> it for an inheritance לָרֽאוּבֵנִ֖י <S%H7206><s%> unto the Reubenites וְלַגָּדִ֑י <S%H1425><s%> and to the Gadites וְלַחֲצִ֖י <S%H2677><s%> and to the half שֵׁ֥בֶט <S%H7626><s%> tribe הַֽמְנַשִּֽׁי׃ <S%H4520><s%> of Manasseh

וּשְׁמַרְתֶּ֗ם <S%H8104><s%> Keep אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵי֙ <S%H1697><s%> therefore the words הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> of this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וַעֲשִׂיתֶ֖ם <S%H6213><s%> and do אֹתָ֑ם <S%H853><s%> לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> that תַּשְׂכִּ֔ילוּ <S%H7919><s%> them that ye may prosper אֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> you תַּעֲשֽׂוּן׃ <S%H6213><s%> in all that ye do פ

אַתֶּ֨ם <S%H859><s%> You נִצָּבִ֤ים <S%H5324><s%> Ye stand הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> this day כֻּלְּכֶ֔ם <S%H3605><s%> all לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> all of you before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H430><s%> your God רָאשֵׁיכֶ֣ם <S%H7218><s%> your captains שִׁבְטֵיכֶ֗ם <S%H7626><s%> of your tribes זִקְנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H2205><s%> your elders וְשֹׁ֣טְרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H7860><s%> and your officers כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> [with] all the men יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> of Israel

טַפְּכֶ֣ם <S%H2945><s%> Your little ones נְשֵׁיכֶ֔ם <S%H802><s%> your wives וְגֵ֣רְךָ֔ <S%H1616><s%> and thy stranger אֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> who בְּקֶ֣רֶב <S%H7130><s%> that [is] in מַחֲנֶ֑יךָ <S%H4264><s%> thy camp מֵחֹטֵ֣ב <S%H2404><s%> from the hewer עֵצֶ֔יךָ <S%H6086><s%> of thy wood עַ֖ד <S%H5704><s%> who שֹׁאֵ֥ב <S%H7579><s%> unto the drawer מֵימֶֽיךָ׃ <S%H4325><s%> of thy water

לְעָבְרְךָ֗ <S%H5674><s%> That thou shouldest enter בִּבְרִ֛ית <S%H1285><s%> into covenant יְהוָ֥ה <S%H3068><s%> with the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֖יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God וּבְאָלָת֑וֹ <S%H423><s%> and into his oath אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD אֱלֹהֶ֔יךָ <S%H430><s%> thy God כֹּרֵ֥ת <S%H3772><s%> maketh עִמְּךָ֖ <S%H5973><s%> you הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> with thee this day

לְמַ֣עַן <S%H4616><s%> order הָקִֽים־ <S%H6965><s%> That he may establish אֹתְךָ֩ <S%H853><s%> הַיּ֨וֹם ׀ <S%H3117><s%> thee to day ל֜וֹ לְעָ֗ם <S%H5971><s%> for a people וְה֤וּא <S%H1931><s%> he יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> become לְּךָ֙ לֵֽאלֹהִ֔ים <S%H430><s%> unto himself and [that] he may be unto thee a God כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <S%H834><s%> he דִּבֶּר־ <S%H1696><s%> as he hath said לָ֑ךְ וְכַאֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> to you נִשְׁבַּע֙ <S%H7650><s%> unto thee and as he hath sworn לַאֲבֹתֶ֔יךָ <S%H1><s%> unto thy fathers לְאַבְרָהָ֥ם <S%H85><s%> to Abraham לְיִצְחָ֖ק <S%H3327><s%> to Isaac וּֽלְיַעֲקֹֽב׃ <S%H3290><s%> and to Jacob

וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> not אִתְּכֶ֖ם <S%H854><s%> for לְבַדְּכֶ֑ם <S%H905><s%> alone אָנֹכִ֗י <S%H595><s%> I כֹּרֵת֙ <S%H3772><s%> Neither with you only do I make אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַבְּרִ֣ית <S%H1285><s%> this covenant הַזֹּ֔את <S%H2063><s%> likewise וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הָאָלָ֖ה <S%H423><s%> and this oath הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise

כִּי֩ <S%H3588><s%> for אֶת־ <S%H854><s%> for אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> who יֶשְׁנ֜וֹ <S%H3426><s%> here with us this פֹּ֗ה <S%H6311><s%> here עִמָּ֙נוּ֙ <S%H5973><s%> with עֹמֵ֣ד <S%H5975><s%> But with [him] that standeth הַיּ֔וֹם <S%H3117><s%> day לִפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וְאֵ֨ת <S%H854><s%> for אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who אֵינֶ֛נּוּ <S%H369><s%> else פֹּ֖ה <S%H6311><s%> here עִמָּ֥נוּ <S%H5973><s%> with הַיּֽוֹם׃ <S%H3117><s%> and also with [him] that [is] not here with us this day

כִּֽי־ <S%H3588><s%> for אַתֶּ֣ם <S%H859><s%> you יְדַעְתֶּ֔ם <S%H3045><s%> (For ye know אֵ֥ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> how יָשַׁ֖בְנוּ <S%H3427><s%> how we have dwelt בְּאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> in the land מִצְרָ֑יִם <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt וְאֵ֧ת <S%H853><s%> אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> and how עָבַ֛רְנוּ <S%H5674><s%> and how we came בְּקֶ֥רֶב <S%H7130><s%> through הַגּוֹיִ֖ם <S%H1471><s%> the nations אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עֲבַרְתֶּֽם׃ <S%H5674><s%> which ye passed by

וַתִּרְאוּ֙ <S%H7200><s%> And ye have seen אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שִׁקּ֣וּצֵיהֶ֔ם <S%H8251><s%> their abominations וְאֵ֖ת <S%H853><s%> גִּלֻּלֵיהֶ֑ם <S%H1544><s%> and their idols עֵ֣ץ <S%H6086><s%> wood וָאֶ֔בֶן <S%H68><s%> and stone כֶּ֥סֶף <S%H3701><s%> silver וְזָהָ֖ב <S%H2091><s%> and gold אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> which עִמָּהֶֽם׃ <S%H5973><s%> with

פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> so יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> Lest there should be בָּ֠כֶם אִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> among you man אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or אִשָּׁ֞ה <S%H802><s%> or woman א֧וֹ <S%H176><s%> or מִשְׁפָּחָ֣ה <S%H4940><s%> or family אוֹ־ <S%H176><s%> or שֵׁ֗בֶט <S%H7626><s%> or tribe אֲשֶׁר֩ <S%H834><s%> whose לְבָב֨וֹ <S%H3824><s%> whose heart פֹנֶ֤ה <S%H6437><s%> turneth away הַיּוֹם֙ <S%H3117><s%> this day מֵעִם֙ <S%H5973><s%> from יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> from the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֔ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God לָלֶ֣כֶת <S%H1980><s%> to go לַעֲבֹ֔ד <S%H5647><s%> [and] serve אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> אֱלֹהֵ֖י <S%H430><s%> the gods הַגּוֹיִ֣ם <S%H1471><s%> of these nations הָהֵ֑ם <S%H1992><s%> of those פֶּן־ <S%H6435><s%> so יֵ֣שׁ <S%H3426><s%> lest there should be בָּכֶ֗ם שֹׁ֛רֶשׁ <S%H8328><s%> among you a root פֹּרֶ֥ה <S%H6509><s%> that beareth רֹ֖אשׁ <S%H7219><s%> gall וְלַעֲנָֽה׃ <S%H3939><s%> and wormwood

וְהָיָ֡ה <S%H1961><s%> have בְּשָׁמְעוֹ֩ <S%H8085><s%> And it come to pass when he heareth אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> דִּבְרֵ֨י <S%H1697><s%> the words הָֽאָלָ֜ה <S%H423><s%> of this curse הַזֹּ֗את <S%H2063><s%> he וְהִתְבָּרֵ֨ךְ <S%H1288><s%> that he bless בִּלְבָב֤וֹ <S%H3824><s%> himself in his heart לֵאמֹר֙ <S%H559><s%> saying שָׁל֣וֹם <S%H7965><s%> I shall have peace יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> have לִּ֔י כִּ֛י <S%H3588><s%> though בִּשְׁרִר֥וּת <S%H8307><s%> in the imagination לִבִּ֖י <S%H3820><s%> of mine heart אֵלֵ֑ךְ <S%H1980><s%> walk לְמַ֛עַן <S%H4616><s%> order סְפ֥וֹת <S%H5595><s%> to add הָרָוָ֖ה <S%H7302><s%> drunkenness אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> הַצְּמֵאָֽה׃ <S%H6771><s%> to thirst

לֹא־ <S%H3808><s%> shall never יֹאבֶ֣ה <S%H14><s%> will יְהוָה֮ <S%H3068><s%> The LORD סְלֹ֣חַֽ <S%H5545><s%> not spare לוֹ֒ כִּ֣י <S%H3588><s%> for אָ֠ז <S%H227><s%> for יֶעְשַׁ֨ן <S%H6225><s%> shall smoke אַף־ <S%H639><s%> him but then the anger יְהוָ֤ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD וְקִנְאָתוֹ֙ <S%H7068><s%> and his jealousy בָּאִ֣ישׁ <S%H376><s%> against that man הַה֔וּא <S%H1931><s%> he וְרָ֤בְצָה <S%H7257><s%> shall lie בּוֹ֙ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> and every הָ֣אָלָ֔ה <S%H423><s%> and all the curses הַכְּתוּבָ֖ה <S%H3789><s%> that are written בַּסֵּ֣פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in this book הַזֶּ֑ה <S%H2088><s%> this וּמָחָ֤ה <S%H4229><s%> shall blot out יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> upon him and the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> שְׁמ֔וֹ <S%H8034><s%> his name מִתַּ֖חַת <S%H8478><s%> under הַשָּׁמָֽיִם׃ <S%H8064><s%> from under heaven

וְהִבְדִּיל֤וֹ <S%H914><s%> shall separate יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD לְרָעָ֔ה <S%H7451><s%> him unto evil מִכֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> out of all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> of Israel כְּכֹל֙ <S%H3605><s%> to all אָל֣וֹת <S%H423><s%> according to all the curses הַבְּרִ֔ית <S%H1285><s%> of the covenant הַכְּתוּבָ֕ה <S%H3789><s%> that are written בְּסֵ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in this book הַתּוֹרָ֖ה <S%H8451><s%> of the law הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וְאָמַ֞ר <S%H559><s%> shall say הַדּ֣וֹר <S%H1755><s%> So that the generation הָֽאַחֲר֗וֹן <S%H314><s%> to come בְּנֵיכֶם֙ <S%H1121><s%> of your children אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> who יָק֙וּמוּ֙ <S%H6965><s%> that shall rise up מֵאַ֣חֲרֵיכֶ֔ם <S%H310><s%> after וְהַ֨נָּכְרִ֔י <S%H5237><s%> you and the stranger אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> who יָבֹ֖א <S%H935><s%> that shall come מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land רְחוֹקָ֑ה <S%H7350><s%> from a far וְ֠רָאוּ <S%H7200><s%> when they see אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> מַכּ֞וֹת <S%H4347><s%> the plagues הָאָ֤רֶץ <S%H776><s%> of that land הַהִוא֙ <S%H1931><s%> he וְאֶת־ <S%H853><s%> תַּ֣חֲלֻאֶ֔יהָ <S%H8463><s%> and the sicknesses אֲשֶׁר־ <S%H834><s%> which חִלָּ֥ה <S%H2470><s%> hath laid יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD בָּֽהּ׃

גָּפְרִ֣ית <S%H1614><s%> thereof [is] brimstone וָמֶלַח֮ <S%H4417><s%> and salt שְׂרֵפָ֣ה <S%H8316><s%> [and] burning כָל־ <S%H3605><s%> All אַרְצָהּ֒ <S%H776><s%> [And that] the whole land לֹ֤א <S%H3808><s%> is not תִזָּרַע֙ <S%H2232><s%> [that] it is not sown וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> nor תַצְמִ֔חַ <S%H6779><s%> nor beareth וְלֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> not יַעֲלֶ֥ה <S%H5927><s%> groweth בָ֖הּ כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All עֵ֑שֶׂב <S%H6212><s%> nor any grass כְּֽמַהְפֵּכַ֞ת <S%H4114><s%> therein like the overthrow סְדֹ֤ם <S%H5467><s%> of Sodom וַעֲמֹרָה֙ <S%H6017><s%> and Gomorrah אַדְמָ֣ה <S%H126><s%> Admah [וּצְבֹיִּים כ] (וּצְבֹויִ֔ם <S%H6636><s%> Zeboiim ק) אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which הָפַ֣ךְ <S%H2015><s%> overthrew יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> which the LORD בְּאַפּ֖וֹ <S%H639><s%> in his anger וּבַחֲמָתֽוֹ׃ <S%H2534><s%> and in his wrath

וְאָֽמְרוּ֙ <S%H559><s%> shall say כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> All הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> Even all nations עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> and מֶ֨ה <S%H4100><s%> how long עָשָׂ֧ה <S%H6213><s%> done יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Wherefore hath the LORD כָּ֖כָה <S%H3602><s%> after that manner לָאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> common הַזֹּ֑את <S%H2063><s%> likewise מֶ֥ה <S%H4100><s%> how long חֳרִ֛י <S%H2750><s%> outburst הָאַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> anger הַגָּד֖וֹל <S%H1419><s%> of this great הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> to this

וְאָ֣מְר֔וּ <S%H559><s%> Then men shall say עַ֚ל <S%H5921><s%> and אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> which עָֽזְב֔וּ <S%H5800><s%> Because they have forsaken אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> בְּרִ֥ית <S%H1285><s%> the covenant יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <S%H430><s%> God אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> of their fathers אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> which כָּרַ֣ת <S%H3772><s%> which he made עִמָּ֔ם <S%H5973><s%> with בְּהוֹצִיא֥וֹ <S%H3318><s%> with them when he brought them forth אֹתָ֖ם <S%H853><s%> מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <S%H4714><s%> of Egypt

וַיֵּלְכ֗וּ <S%H1980><s%> went וַיַּֽעַבְדוּ֙ <S%H5647><s%> and served אֱלֹהִ֣ים <S%H430><s%> gods אֲחֵרִ֔ים <S%H312><s%> other וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲוּ֖וּ <S%H7812><s%> and worshipped לָהֶ֑ם אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> them gods אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> whom לֹֽא־ <S%H3808><s%> have not יְדָע֔וּם <S%H3045><s%> whom they knew וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> had not חָלַ֖ק <S%H2505><s%> not and [whom] he had not given לָהֶֽם׃

וַיִּֽחַר־ <S%H2734><s%> was kindled אַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> And the anger יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> of the LORD בָּאָ֣רֶץ <S%H776><s%> against this land הַהִ֑וא <S%H1931><s%> he לְהָבִ֤יא <S%H935><s%> to bring עָלֶ֙יהָ֙ <S%H5921><s%> and אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> every הַקְּלָלָ֔ה <S%H7045><s%> upon it all the curses הַכְּתוּבָ֖ה <S%H3789><s%> that are written בַּסֵּ֥פֶר <S%H5612><s%> in this book הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

וַיִּתְּשֵׁ֤ם <S%H5428><s%> rooted יְהוָה֙ <S%H3068><s%> And the LORD מֵעַ֣ל <S%H5921><s%> from אַדְמָתָ֔ם <S%H127><s%> them out of their land בְּאַ֥ף <S%H639><s%> in anger וּבְחֵמָ֖ה <S%H2534><s%> and in wrath וּבְקֶ֣צֶף <S%H7110><s%> indignation גָּד֑וֹל <S%H1419><s%> and in great וַיַּשְׁלִכֵ֛ם <S%H7993><s%> and cast אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> about אֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> land אַחֶ֖רֶת <S%H312><s%> them into another כַּיּ֥וֹם <S%H3117><s%> as [it is] this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <S%H2088><s%> this

הַ֨נִּסְתָּרֹ֔ת <S%H5641><s%> The secret לַיהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> [things belong] unto the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֑ינוּ <S%H430><s%> our God וְהַנִּגְלֹ֞ת <S%H1540><s%> but those [things which are] revealed לָ֤ׅנׅוּׅ וּׅלְׅבָׅנֵׅ֙יׅנׅוּׅ֙ <S%H1121><s%> [belong] unto us and to our children עַד־ <S%H5704><s%> for עוֹלָ֔ם <S%H5769><s%> ever לַעֲשׂ֕וֹת <S%H6213><s%> that [we] may do אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> all דִּבְרֵ֖י <S%H1697><s%> all the words הַתּוֹרָ֥ה <S%H8451><s%> of this law הַזֹּֽאת׃ <S%H2063><s%> likewise ס
